sae-password.help: WPA3 SAE password to be used to authenticate WiFi users.
sae-password.name: sae-password

scan-botnet-connections.help: Block or monitor connections to Botnet servers or disable Botnet scanning.
scan-botnet-connections.name: scan-botnet-connections

options.help: Do not scan connections to botnet servers.
options.name: disable

options.help: Log connections to botnet servers.
options.name: monitor

options.help: Block connections to botnet servers.
options.name: block

schedule.help: Firewall schedules for enabling this VAP on the FortiAP. This VAP will be enabled when at least one of the schedules is valid. Separate multiple schedule names with a space.
schedule.name: schedule

secondary-wag-profile.help: Secondary wireless access gateway profile name.
secondary-wag-profile.name: secondary-wag-profile

security.help: Security mode for the wireless interface (default = wpa2-only-personal).
security.name: security

options.help: Open.
options.name: open

options.help: Captive portal.
options.name: captive-portal

options.help: WEP 64-bit.
options.name: wep64

options.help: WEP 128-bit.
options.name: wep128

options.help: WPA/WPA2 personal.
options.name: wpa-personal

options.help: WPA/WPA2 personal with captive portal.
options.name: wpa-personal+captive-portal

options.help: WPA/WPA2 enterprise.
options.name: wpa-enterprise

options.help: WPA personal.
options.name: wpa-only-personal

options.help: WPA personal with captive portal.
options.name: wpa-only-personal+captive-portal

options.help: WPA enterprise.
options.name: wpa-only-enterprise

options.help: WPA2 personal.
options.name: wpa2-only-personal

options.help: WPA2 personal with captive portal.
options.name: wpa2-only-personal+captive-portal

options.help: WPA2 enterprise.
options.name: wpa2-only-enterprise

options.help: WPA3 enterprise with 192-bit encryption and PMF mandatory.
options.name: wpa3-enterprise

options.help: WPA3 enterprise with PMF mandatory.
options.name: wpa3-only-enterprise

options.help: WPA3 enterprise with PMF optional.
options.name: wpa3-enterprise-transition

options.help: WPA3 SAE.
options.name: wpa3-sae

options.help: WPA3 SAE transition.
options.name: wpa3-sae-transition

options.help: Opportunistic wireless encryption.
options.name: owe

options.help: OSEN.
options.name: osen

security-exempt-list.help: Optional security exempt list for captive portal authentication.
security-exempt-list.name: security-exempt-list

security-redirect-url.help: Optional URL for redirecting users after they pass captive portal authentication.
security-redirect-url.name: security-redirect-url

selected-usergroups.help: Selective user groups that are permitted to authenticate.
selected-usergroups.name: selected-usergroups

options.help: Enable split tunneling.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable split tunneling.
options.name: disable

ssid.help: IEEE 802.11 service set identifier (SSID) for the wireless interface. Users who wish to use the wireless network must configure their computers to access this SSID name.
ssid.name: ssid

sticky-client-remove.help: Enable/disable sticky client remove to maintain good signal level clients in SSID (default = disable).
sticky-client-remove.name: sticky-client-remove

options.help: Enable sticky client remove.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable sticky client remove.
options.name: disable

sticky-client-threshold-2g.help: Minimum signal level/threshold in dBm required for the 2G client to be serviced by the AP (-95 to -20, default = -79).
sticky-client-threshold-2g.name: sticky-client-threshold-2g

sticky-client-threshold-5g.help: Minimum signal level/threshold in dBm required for the 5G client to be serviced by the AP (-95 to -20, default = -76).
sticky-client-threshold-5g.name: sticky-client-threshold-5g

options.help: Enable 802.11ax target wake time.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable 802.11ax target wake time.
options.name: disable

options.help: Enable TKIP counter measure.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable TKIP counter measure.
options.name: disable

tunnel-echo-interval.help: The time interval to send echo to both primary and secondary tunnel peers (1 - 65535 sec, default = 300).
tunnel-echo-interval.name: tunnel-echo-interval

tunnel-fallback-interval.help: The time interval for secondary tunnel to fall back to primary tunnel (0 - 65535 sec, default = 7200).
tunnel-fallback-interval.name: tunnel-fallback-interval

usergroup.help: Firewall user group to be used to authenticate WiFi users.
usergroup.name: usergroup

options.help: Enable UTM logging.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable UTM logging.
options.name: disable

utm-status.help: Enable to add one or more security profiles (AV, IPS, etc.) to the VAP.
utm-status.name: utm-status

options.help: Enable setting.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable setting.
options.name: disable

vlan-auto.help: Enable/disable automatic management of SSID VLAN interface.
vlan-auto.name: vlan-auto

options.help: Enable automatic management of SSID VLAN interface.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable automatic management of SSID VLAN interface.
options.name: disable

vlan-name.help: Table for mapping VLAN name to VLAN ID.
vlan-name.name: vlan-name

vlan-pooling.help: Enable/disable VLAN pooling, to allow grouping of multiple wireless controller VLANs into VLAN pools (default = disable). When set to wtp-group, VLAN pooling occurs with VLAN assignment by wtp-group.
vlan-pooling.name: vlan-pooling

options.help: Enable VLAN pooling with VLAN assignment by wtp-group.
options.name: wtp-group

options.help: Enable VLAN pooling with round-robin VLAN assignment.
options.name: round-robin

options.help: Enable VLAN pooling with hash-based VLAN assignment.
options.name: hash

options.help: Disable VLAN pooling.
options.name: disable

voice-enterprise.help: Enable/disable 802.11k and 802.11v assisted Voice-Enterprise roaming (default = disable).
voice-enterprise.name: voice-enterprise

options.help: Disable 802.11k and 802.11v assisted Voice-Enterprise roaming.
options.name: disable

options.help: Enable 802.11k and 802.11v assisted Voice-Enterprise roaming.
options.name: enable
